sections.heading: Repealed.Section 4-55C-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 2009, ch. 270, § 1; 2019, ch. 110, § 2; repealed by Laws 2023, ch. 150, § 11.

Repeals.— Laws 2023, ch. 150, § 11 repealed 4-55C-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2009, ch. 270, § 1, relating to short title, effective June 16, 2023. For provisions of former section,seethe 2022 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
